title: Test
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 31 data points.
Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.

Inflation rate compared to previous year is slightly decreasing from 1994 to 1997, rapidly increasing from 1997 to 1999, slightly decreasing from 1999 to 2000, roughly constant from 2000 to 2007, slightly increasing from 2007 to 2008, roughly constant from 2008 to 2011, roughly increasing from 2011 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2014, slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015, roughly decreasing from 2015 to 2016, roughly constant from 2016 to 2018, slightly increasing from 2018 to 2019, and lastly roughly constant from 2019 to 2024.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 1995 and 1996.
Max Inflation rate compared to previous year about 307.63 was recorded at Year 1994
Min Inflation rate compared to previous year about 2.88 was recorded at Year 2018
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 31 data points. The chart has 6 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2001 to 2007.
But, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2015 to 2020.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2020 to 2024.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2011 to 2015.
Conversely, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2007 to 2011.
Additionally, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 1997 to 2001.
